member.name: T:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings
member.summary: Holds the instances of all Site Settings configurations which are in the WebConfig file.

remarks.para: The Settings class contains information about site settings configuration. This includes the current instance of site settings configuration via (Instance) and all sites settings configuration via (ALL).
The Settings class has the fallback host, which is indicates with "*" in the web.config file for an enterprise solution.

member.name: F:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings._indexingTextRegExpDefaultValue
member.summary: The default regular expression to index words in pages
member.remarks: Short description for Unicode character categories \p{x} below: L=letters, N=numbers, S=symbols Check out http://www.unicode.org/Public/UNIDATA/UnicodeData.html for more info. Each word must contain at least 2 chars.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.Save(EPiServer.Framework.Configuration.RestartMode)
member.summary: Saves the configuration file.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.Save
member.summary: Save method for the web.config file.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.CopyValues(EPiServer.Configuration.Settings,EPiServer.Configuration.Settings)
member.summary: Copies all values from one Settings instance to another instance.iisreset.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.MapHostToSettings(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Maps a host name to a instance.
member.param: Specifies whether to use a fallback settings instance or not.
member.returns: A Settings instance with configuration information to handle this request.
member.remarks: This is used for enterprise solutions where you have multiple <settings> sections in the same web.config file.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.MapUrlToSettings(System.Uri)
member.summary: Maps URL to a instance.
member.remarks: This is used for enterprise solutions where you have multiple <settings> sections in the same web.config file. If the host name that is safe to use for DNS resolution does not exist, then it maps to fallback host which is indicates with "*".
member.exception: Thrown ArgumentNullException if the URI is null.
Thrown ArgumentException if the URI is not absolute.
If the URI absolute path is not equal with the site settings absolute path. Hits when the URI has a path that is outside of the application root.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.InitializeAllSettings
member.summary: Sets up all static variables of the Settings class based on the web.config file in the applications root directory.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.InitializeAllSettings(System.Configuration.Configuration)
member.summary: Sets up all static variables of the Settings class based on System.Configuration.Configuration object passed as a parameter.
member.param: The System.Configuration.Configuration object that contains the EPiServer settings.
member.exception: If there is an enterprise solution and the siteHosts section is missing with the value "*".

member.name: M:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.ValidateRuntimeSettings
member.summary: Validates all settings consistency and with the runtime.
member.remarks: It's ok to call frequently. It will only validate when there's a valid HtppContext and a Control handling the request, and it will only validate once.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.ValidateUriAgainstAppRoot(System.Uri,System.String)
member.summary: Validates the URI against app root.

member.summary: Gets the version of this configuration.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.Instance
member.summary: Get the current configuration settings.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.All
member.summary: Gets an containing all Settings instances in the application's configuration file. The Dictionary uses the site tags' applicationId attribute as keys.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.Parent
member.summary: Gets or sets the parent.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.BackgroundCopyThreshold
member.summary: Gets or sets the background copy threshold. If a copy operation is requested with a larger number of pages than threshold then the copy is performed in a background thread.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.EnableScheduler
member.summary: Set to false to disable EPiServer's connection with the scheduler. Default value (if the tag does not exist) is true.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.StringCompressionThreshold
member.summary: Set to the number of characters when compression should be activated.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.StringDelayedLoadThreshold
member.summary: Set to the number of characters when delayed loading should be activated for large strings in properties deriving from Long String.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.RemoteWebServiceCulture
member.summary: Set the System.Threading.Thread.CurrentThread.CurrentCulture if handling pages remote.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.IndexingDelayAfterPublish
member.summary: Delay time between publish and indexing.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.IndexingTextEnabled
member.summary: If indexing of text into keywords should be enabled.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.UIDefaultPanelTab
member.summary: The index of the EditPanel tab that is to be shown by default when clicking a page in the edit mode page tree.
member.remarks:
The value of this property is used as an zero-based index in an array of EditPanel tabs. For example, all pages in a default installation of the example will have the following tabs:
Tab name Index View 0 Edit 1 Version list 2

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.IndexingTextRegExp
member.summary: The regular expression to index words in pages.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.UIImageTransparencyReplacement
member.summary: The color that should replace the transparent color in a picture compression.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.GlobalErrorHandling
member.summary: Set whether you want to use EPiServer's error handling.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.UISafeHtmlTags
member.summary: Set which tags should not be encoded.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.UIOptimizeTreeForSpeed
member.summary: Sets if page tree controls should evaluate if tree nodes have children.
member.remarks: Default value is false. If set to true, tree controls will not evaluate if a node has children when it becomes visible. Only nodes that have children will display an expand icon ([+]), which means [+]NodeName. If set to true, tree controls will not evaluate if a node has children when it becomes visible. Thus all nodes will display an expand icon, regardless if it has children or not. This behavior will increase performance when displaying large tree structures.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.SgmlParserDecodeCharEntities
member.summary: Defines whether SgmlParser should decode character entities (like " ") or not.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.EnableXmlRpcHeader
member.summary: Defines whether xmlrpc headers should be added to page output.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.DisableVersionDeletion
member.summary: Defines if the user interface should disable tools to increase traceability.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.EnablePerformanceCounters
member.summary: Defines if performance counter data should be collected.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.RemoteCacheListenerShortNames
member.summary: A list of remote sites that will recieve notifications when a change is made

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.HttpCacheVaryByCustom
member.summary: Specifies a custom text string to vary cached output responses by. Passed to Response.Cache.SetVaryByCustom.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.HttpCacheVaryByParams
member.summary: The parameters to the page (i.e. querystring) that the cache should vary by. Forwarded to Response.Cache.SetVaryByParams.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.HttpCacheExpiration
member.summary: Value to set the number of seconds a page should be cached.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.HttpCacheability
member.summary: Value to set the HttpCacheability enumeration for the cach.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.PageCacheSlidingExpiration
member.summary: The page cache interval (in hours) for the local database. Set to "0" to disable.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.ContentVersionCacheSlidingExpiration
member.summary: The sliding cache for how long a content version is cached. Set to "0:0:0" to disable.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.RemoteInvalidateVersionChanges
member.summary: Set to true to force remote invalidation of cache of specific versions. This is can be used when there are load balanced editor servers and changes to a specific version should be immediately seen. Otherwise it is controlled by .

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.RemotePageCacheSlidingExpiration
member.summary: The page cache intervals (in hours) for remote sites. Set to "0" to disable.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.UIEditorCssPaths
member.summary: Defines which css file to use when rendering the editor. Reg exp pattern for validation is "^/[\w/\.-]{1,256}".

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.UIEditorColors
member.summary: Defines what colors should be available for the editors

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.UIEditorUnformattingPersistedTags
member.summary: Controls which html tags that should not be preserved in "Remove format" action in editor.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.UrlRewriteExtension
member.summary: Defines an extension that is mapped to ASP.NET for the URL

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.UrlPreventRewriteAttrebute
member.summary: For internal use, do not use. Defines the HTML attribute name that is used by the CMS 5 legacy editor when writing / parsing content

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.UrlRebaseKind
member.summary: Defines the type of rebasing to do for links when using Friendly URLs

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.IISHiddenSegments
member.summary: Defines IIS' hidden segments in comma separated format.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.EnableSavingOfConfigurationToDatabase
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the configuration should be saved to database.
member.remarks: The mirroring service requires that the configruation is saved to database and therefore if the site is to be mirrored to or from the setting must be set to true.
member.value: true if the configuration should be saved to database; otherwise, false.

member.summary: The site name that is used when communicating with other EPiServer sites. RegExp Pattern for validation: "^([a-zA-Z0-9\.-]{0,256})$".

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.SiteUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the site URL. It must be a Web URL, and include the path to the site root. It is only to be used to generate direct references to the site in external locations. For references from a page, use root-relative URLs and ResolveUrl etc as appropriate.
member.value: The site URL. Guaranteed to end with a '/'.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.UIUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the URL to the relocateable UI folder. It must be a Web URL, and may include scheme and port. It must be a Web URL, and include the path to the site root. It is only to be used to generate direct references to the site in external locations. For references from a page, use root-relative URLs and ResolveUrl etc as appropriate.
member.value: The "UI" URL. Guaranteed to end with a '/'.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.UtilUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the URL to the relocateable Util folder. It must be a Web URL, and may include scheme and port. It must be a Web URL, and include the path to the site root. It is only to be used to generate direct references to the site in external locations. For references from a page, use root-relative URLs and ResolveUrl etc as appropriate.
member.value: The "Util" URL. Guaranteed to end with a '/'.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.SiteDisplayName
member.summary: The name of the site. RegExp Pattern for validation: "^([\x20\w0-9\.-]{0,256})$".
member.value: The display name of the site.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.ConnectionStringName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the connection string.
member.value: The name of the connection string.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.ErrorMailHandler
member.summary: Gets or sets the error mail handler.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.PageFolderVirtualPathProviderName
member.summary: Name for the VirtualPathProvider that is responsible for handling of page folders

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.UITheme
member.summary: Setting for what graphical theme should be used.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.EnableEvents
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether events are enabled.
member.value: true if events are enabled; otherwise, false.
member.remarks: The event system is no longer controlled by EPiServer CMS and this setting is ignored.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.EnableRemoteEvents
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether remote event is enabled.
member.value: true if remote events are enabled; otherwise, false.
member.remarks: The event system is no longer controlled by EPiServer CMS and this setting is ignored.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.AutoSaveInterval
member.summary: Gets or sets the auto save interval. If the value is less than 10 seconds, the auto save feature will be turned off.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.OperationCompatibility
member.summary: Gets or sets the operation compatibility. Default value is None.
member.remarks: See for details on the individual values.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.MirroringSource
member.summary: The endpoint to use when communicating with mirroring server

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.GoogleMapsApiV3Url
member.summary: Gets or sets the URL for Google Maps API v3
member.value: The URL for Google Maps API v3, possibly site-specific.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.UseLegacyEditMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the useLegacyEditMode for determining which edit mode is set to run

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.DeadlockRetries
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of retry attempts when a database deadlock occurs.
member.remarks: Deadlocks will usually not occur, but during special circumstances you may experience deadlocks. This could for example happen if pages are created and published very frequently (>10 pages per second).

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.DeadlockRetryDelay
member.summary: Gets or sets the deadlock retry delay.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.DraftRetainPeriod
member.summary: Gets or sets the retain period for the draft created by the autosave functionality.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.PermanentEditRetainPeriod
member.summary: Gets or sets the retain period for the page's "permanent edit" status.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.DatabaseQueryTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the database query timeout.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.MaxContentsPerDatabaseRequest
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of contents when contents requested from database.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.GlobalBlockFolderId
member.summary: ID of the global block folder that is shared between sites.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.SiteBlockFolderId
member.summary: ID of the site block folder that holds site specific blocks.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.Settings.EnableModelSyncCommit
member.summary: Set to false to disable the commit phase when synchronizing typed models. Block types and page types will not be updated automatically.

member.name: T:EPiServer.Configuration.EPiServerCompatibility
member.summary: Operation Compatibility

member.name: F:EPiServer.Configuration.EPiServerCompatibility.None
member.summary: There is no compatibility enabled at all.

member.name: F:EPiServer.Configuration.EPiServerCompatibility.PageStoreDelete
member.summary: The delete operation on Data Factory component can treat as old version of Data Factory.

member.name: F:EPiServer.Configuration.EPiServerCompatibility.PageStoreSave
member.summary: The save operation on Data Factory component can treat as old version of Data Factory.

member.name: F:EPiServer.Configuration.EPiServerCompatibility.LegacyPropertyValueType
member.summary:
The Value property of the following property types returns the same Type as in the old version instead of the new Type aligned with the property's PropertyDataType:
Property Type | Old Value Type | New Value Type PropertyXhtmlString | string | EPiServer.Core.XhtmlString PropertyXForm | string | EPiServer.XForms.XForm PropertyUrl | string | EPiServer.Url PropertyDocumentUrl | string | EPiServer.Url PropertyImageUrl | string | EPiServer.Url
member.remarks: This setting is not compatible with strongly typed content models.

member.name: F:EPiServer.Configuration.EPiServerCompatibility.LongStringLegacyControl
member.summary: The CreatePropertyControl method on the PropertyLongString property creates PropertyLongStringControl otherwise a PropertyStringControl be created.

member.name: F:EPiServer.Configuration.EPiServerCompatibility.Full
member.summary: Enable all compatibility flags.

member.name: T:EPiServer.Configuration.VirtualPathElement
member.summary: Handles the configuration inder XPath node //EPiServer/virtualPath

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.VirtualPathElement.IllegalCharactersRegEx
member.summary: Gets the characters that are illegal in a file or directory name. The value should be a regular expression, e.g. "%|\+"

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.VirtualPathElement.IllegalCharactersDisplayString
member.summary: Gets the characters that are illegal in a file or directory name. The value are used to inform users which characters that are not allowed in file or directory names. The value should be a readable string, e.g. '%', '+'

member.name: P:EPiServer.Configuration.VirtualRolesElement.FailSafeIsInRole
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether IsInRole on VirtualRolePrincipal may throw an exception.
member.value: true if IsInRole is fail safe (cannot throw exception); otherwise, false.
member.remarks: This setting can be useful to emulate the behavior of IsInRole as it worked in .NET Framework 1.0 / 1.1 In these versions any exceptions thrown by code executing beneath IsInRole were caught and ignored. The IsInRole for a WindowsPrincipal in .NET 2.0 may throw an exception if a domain controller is unavailable - this may be undesired behavior since it could prevent the logon process, thus preventing any user from logging on. By setting this property to True you will cause any exceptions thrown by IsInRole to be caught and ignored. The IsInRole call will be interpreted as returning False on throw.
